content: EDIT: downgraded to 2 stars. The standard of English used in this app is increasingly atrocious. Within the newer games, and many stores, it's become a mix of pidgin Chinglish, Singlish and babytalk. Worrying how this might influence younger users. There's no way to leave feedback for bad sellers once you've been refunded, so these sellers maintain a deceptively clean record. The only way to leave negative feedback is to accept faulty goods, which then prevents one from obtaining refunds.
